column5: The Lakefront getaway you have been looking for! Just 55 minutes from the heart of Dallas and 25 minutes from Canton Market . Enjoy panoramic lake views through an expansive 16' sliding patio door, leading to the large covered back deck, providing a true indoor-outdoor experience. You will feel right at home with a fully stocked kitchen, cozy cabin interior, outdoor fire pit and breathtaking sunsets.  Perfect for a quiet personal get away or a couples retreat.  Come enjoy some wine and relax!
column8: Container House Cabin on the Lake!
